metadata.title: CVE-2020-6569 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in WebUSB in Google Chrome prior to 85.0.4183.83 allowed aremote attacker who had compromised the renderer process to potentiallyexploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
